title: States of Change
description: Aishling Colreavy, having left her husband of fourteen years, has travelled to Ireland with her son Liam to try and find James Caldwell, her former lover and Liam's true father. Will Aishling And James still have feelings after so long apart; will James accept Liam as his son after they meet for the first time; will Aishling fall for Haggis whom she has met along the way; and what of Liam's Celtic paranormal like abilities to become the raven spirit?
author: Andrew James Pritchard
